name: Sussanne Belonging LD46
description:
Sussanne needs to protect her oddly shaped trophy from the little enemy minions, or at least that was intended, the game is buggy and lack from the old good mechanics that we all love, but hey, you can shoot and kill enemy's, that is something.

EXIT WITH ALT+F4. 
WASD to move, click to shoot.

It is my first developed game, i am not proud, but i am happy that i could get this far with almost not experience in UE4, now my brain is a fritata.
